name: JunkStar
description:
Made in 3 Days using Construct 2, Photoshop CS5, FL Studio 5, Cinema4D and Bfxr.

Your spaceship can shoot trash and crystals. (shoot with A change with B) You also need to find new trash and crystals to progress. Enemies, asteroids and trashbags contain trash and crystals:

enemy ship: 3 trash asteroid: 1 crystal trashbag: 2 trash

So you have to sacrifice ammo. If you’re out of ammo, you can sacrifice one of your lives to ram a trashbag or asteroid.

Enemy ships can’t be collided with, so that you have cool dogfights.

There are 3 sectors to explore, each sector has a starbase, where you can buy passage to the next sector, buy 1UPs and convert from trash to crystals and reverse.
